title: New: L.W.H. – All In Your Hands (ft. Main Attrakionz, Shady Blaze & Friendzone)
content:
Yesterday our friends over at Get Off The Coast premiered the new track from L.W.H. and a group of producer/Mcs that have been impressing as of late; namely Main Attrakionz, Shady Blaze & Friendzone. The track itself is glorious. 3 and a half minutes of euphoric synth instrumentation, that feels like the audio equivalent of watching the stars. It will make you melt.

The flows from Main Attrakionz & Shady Blaze give a dose of relativity to what could have been a simply elevating experience. ‘The world is crazy, I used to want to help, but then I leant I can’t save it. But I can damn sure save myself”, it’s empowering yet demolishing to listen to; and all to a back drop that will make you feel that nothing matters anyway.

Stream and download below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
